mapper.update: insert all into board (boardid, title, boardcontent, name) values (board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{boardcontent}, #{name}) into board_writter (boardid, id) values (board_seq.currval, #{id}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select a.boardid, a.title, a.writetime, a.viewcnt, a.name, b.id from board a inner join board_writter b on a.boardid = b.boardid order by a.boardid desc
select a.boardid, a.title, a.writetime, a.boardcontent, a.viewcnt, a.name, b.id from board a inner join board_writter b on a.boardid = b.boardid where a.boardid = #{boardid}
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where boardid = #{boardid}
update board set title = #{title}, boardcontent = #{boardcontent} where boardid = #{boardid}
